articles.title: Oppo Reno 12 series with AI features to launch in India soon: All the details - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Oppo has showcased its AI features, which will arrive in the upcoming Reno 12 series. It will also have advanced camera technology for stunning photography.
articles.content: Popular Chinese smartphone manufacturer, Oppo launched the Reno 12 and Reno 12 Pro globally last week, and now both smartphones are set to launch in India soon. Oppo has already started teasing the s… [+1687 chars]
